title: 求bossshop变量
author: Ice_Hun冰魂
txt_content: bossshop都有哪些变量显示点劵的变量是什么

replies.author: djnnnnnnna
replies.txt_content:
金币变量:%balance%
点券变量:%balancepoints%
玩家名字变量:%player%或%name%

replies.author: Ice_Hun冰魂
replies.txt_content:
